About Abdul Vasay

Hello! I am a dedicated Computer Science student specializing in AI & ML at Lords Institute of Engineering & Technology. As the founder and leader of Codewave Hub, and holding the position of Vice President at Artigenz Student Community, my passion lies in promoting inclusivity and diversity within the tech industry. My primary goal is to cultivate a collaborative atmosphere that encourages personal and professional development, innovation, and the exchange of knowledge. My journey involves a deep dive into the latest technological advancements, advocacy for open-source initiatives, and a commitment to inspiring the upcoming generation of tech visionaries.
